text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif
Helvetica Neue, Arial, sans-serif
PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

svg.text: 减值依据总结与审计建议

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 六大减值依据

text.font-family: Helvetica Neue, Arial, sans-serif
PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 租金收入持续下滑

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 2021-2023年租金年化下滑9.5%，未来现金流预期减少，

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 直接影响资产可收回金额

text.font-family: Helvetica Neue, Arial, sans-serif
PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 投资回报率低于市场基准

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 静态回报期从22年延长至28-35年，年化收益率降至3.0-3.5%，

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 接近无风险利率，资产投资吸引力丧失

text.font-family: Helvetica Neue, Arial, sans-serif
PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 空置率上升至历史高位

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 空置率从13.77%攀升至约20%，资产利用效率显著下降，

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 账面价值难以支撑

text.font-family: Helvetica Neue, Arial, sans-serif
PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 主力租户退租频繁

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 零售贸易和消费服务业中小企业退租频繁，呈净流出状态，

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 租金收入稳定性和可预测性降低

text.font-family: Helvetica Neue, Arial, sans-serif
PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 市场对比显示区域性风险扩散

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 全市写字楼市场整体承压，观音桥虽优于解放碑、江北嘴，

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 但系统性风险已向次级商圈传导

text.font-family: Helvetica Neue, Arial, sans-serif
PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neve, sans-serif

g.text: 供需失衡短期无法改善

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 新增供应持续释放而需求疲软，供需矛盾持续2-3年，

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 账面价值存在高估风险

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 审计结论与建议

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 减值判断

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 基于上述六大依据，观音桥写字楼

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 资产的

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 可收回金额显著低于账面

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 价值

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: ，存在明显减值迹象。

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 审计建议

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 建议对观音桥写字楼资产

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: 计提减值准备

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: • 减值比例：待专业评估机构确定

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: • 会计准则：IAS 36 / CAS 8

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

g.text: • 建议进一步开展独立评估

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei UI, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

svg.text: 观音桥写字楼减值分析
